rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Raid[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, if this isn't a token, create a token copy of this permanent.
Crew 2
rules_text2:
As a additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Reveal the top six cards of your library, you may cast a permanent card from among them with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed permanents mana value without paying its mana cost. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your library in any order.
